definitions.text: a periodic state during which you are conscious and aware of the world
examples: consciousness during wakefulness in a sane person is pretty well ordered and familiar

definitions.text: a temporary state in which you are unable (or unwilling) to sleep
examples: accept your wakefulness and sleep in its own contrary way is more likely to come

definitions.text: the process of paying close and continuous attention
examples: wakefulness, watchfulness, and bellicosity make a good hunter
vigilance is especially susceptible to fatigue
